title: Ghost Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/3/18
itunes:title: Ghost Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/3/18
description:
George Noory and supernatural storyteller Jim Harold recount some of his favorite ghost stories from listeners of his paranormal podcast, including tales of angels, ghostly janitors and someone who came face to face with the Devil.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
